sourcesContent:
import tourImg01 from "../images/tour-img01.jpg";
import tourImg02 from "../images/tour-img02.jpg";
import tourImg03 from "../images/tour-img03.jpg";
import tourImg04 from "../images/tour-img04.jpg";
import tourImg05 from "../images/tour-img05.jpg";
import tourImg06 from "../images/tour-img06.jpg";
import tourImg07 from "../images/tour-img07.jpg";

const tours = [
  {
    id: "01",
    title: "Westminister Bridge",
    city: "London",
    distance: 300,
    address: "Somewhere",
    price: 99,
    maxGroupSize: 10,
    desc: "A beautiful historical bridge in the heart of London.",
    reviews: [
      {
        name: "John Doe",
        rating: 4.6,
        reviewText: "Wonderful experience!",
        date: "2025-06-16",
      },
      {
        name: "Jane Smith",
        rating: 5,
        reviewText: "Absolutely loved it!",
        date: "2025-06-17",
      },
    ],
    avgRating: 4.8,
    photo: tourImg01,
    featured: true,
  },
  {
    id: "02",
    title: "Bali, Indonesia",
    city: "Indonesia",
    distance: 400,
    address: "Somewhere",
    price: 99,
    maxGroupSize: 8,
    desc: "Relaxing beaches and lush green rice fields.",
    reviews: [
      {
        name: "Alex Johnson",
        rating: 4.9,
        reviewText: "Bali is breathtaking!",
        date: "2025-06-18",
      },
    ],
    avgRating: 4.9,
    photo: tourImg02,
    featured: true,
  },
  {
    id: "03",
    title: "Snowy Mountains, Thailand",
    city: "Thailand",
    distance: 500,
    address: "Somewhere",
    price: 99,
    maxGroupSize: 8,
    desc: "A surprising snow-covered destination in tropical Thailand.",
    reviews: [
      {
        name: "Emily Davis",
        rating: 4.7,
        reviewText: "The snow and scenery were amazing!",
        date: "2025-06-20",
      },
    ],
    avgRating: 4.7,
    photo: tourImg03,
    featured: true,
  },
  {
    id: "04",
    title: "Beautiful Sunrise, Thailand",
    city: "Thailand",
    distance: 500,
    address: "Somewhere",
    price: 99,
    maxGroupSize: 8,
    desc: "Witness the most beautiful sunrise on earth.",
    reviews: [
      {
        name: "David Nguyen",
        rating: 5,
        reviewText: "Woke up early and it was totally worth it!",
        date: "2025-06-22",
      },
    ],
    avgRating: 5.0,
    photo: tourImg04,
    featured: true,
  },
  {
    id: "05",
    title: "Nusa Penida, Bali, Indonesia",
    city: "Indonesia",
    distance: 500,
    address: "Somewhere",
    price: 99,
    maxGroupSize: 8,
    desc: "Adventure to cliffs, crystal clear water, and marine life.",
    reviews: [
      {
        name: "Sarah Lee",
        rating: 4.5,
        reviewText: "A paradise for nature lovers.",
        date: "2025-06-25",
      },
    ],
    avgRating: 4.5,
    photo: tourImg05,
    featured: false,
  },
  {
    id: "06",
    title: "Cherry Blossoms Spring",
    city: "Japan",
    distance: 500,
    address: "Somewhere",
    price: 99,
    maxGroupSize: 8,
    desc: "Best season to enjoy pink petals falling in Japan.",
    reviews: [
      {
        name: "Kenji Tanaka",
        rating: 4.8,
        reviewText: "Sakura season is magical!",
        date: "2025-06-28",
      },
    ],
    avgRating: 4.8,
    photo: tourImg06,
    featured: false,
  },
  {
    id: "07",
    title: "Holmen Lofoten",
    city: "France",
    distance: 500,
    address: "Somewhere",
    price: 99,
    maxGroupSize: 8,
    desc: "Experience the beauty of French fjords and cold air.",
    reviews: [],
    avgRating: 0,
    photo: tourImg07,
    featured: false,
  },
  {
    id: "08",
    title: "Snowy Mountains, Thailand",
    city: "Thailand",
    distance: 500,
    address: "Somewhere",
    price: 99,
    maxGroupSize: 8,
    desc: "Quiet snowy mountains for hiking and peace.",
    reviews: [],
    avgRating: 0,
    photo: tourImg03,
    featured: false,
  },
];

export default tours;
